WorkItem.Description:
I'm using a GMapControl in an AvalonDock tab. Marker shows correctly at program start, but when I change between tabs, markers disappears (their shape become null). I've read about a similar (or equal) issue [here](https://greatmaps.codeplex.com/workitem/16015) that told the same, but it was closed as solved.
Markers also disappear when the tab is dragged as a floating window.
It's still happening. I've searched for a possible workaround without success.

I've attached a little sample project that reproduces the issue.
WorkItem.Summary: Marker disappears when WPF GMapControl on a TabItem

Comments.Message: the TabControl itself the one who destroys all the childs in the unload TabItem
Is there any possible solution/workaround? Thanks.
